column6: "HM Chief Inspector Of Constabulary has responsibility for all of HMIC's activities. HM Chief Inspector is Chair of the HMIC Board."
column19: Post previously coded 1HMIC01, team too small for detail, costs included in 1HMIC01

column5: HM Inspector of Constabulary Northern Region
column6: "HMI Northern has responsibility for police forces in the north of England. HMI Northern is Senior Responsible Owner for HMIC's value for money programme and is a HMIC Board member."

column5: HM Inspector of Constabulary Eastern Region
column6: "HMI Eastern has responsibility for police forces in the east of England. HMI Eastern is Senior Responsible Owner for HMIC's police authority inspection programme and is a HMIC Board member."

"HMI National has responsibility for the Metropolitan Police Service, the Police Service of Northern Ireland, the City of London Police, the British Transport Police, SOCA, HMRC, Ministry of Defence Police, Civil Nuclear Constabulary, Jersey, Guernsey, Cyprus and the Royal Gibraltar Police.  HMI National is also the HMIC's Senior Responsible Owner for Counter Terrorism, Protection from Serious Harm, the Olympic Games (2012), and is a HMIC Board member."

column5: HM Inspector of Constabulary Western Region
column6: "HMI Western has responsibility for police forces in the west of England and in Wales. HMI Western is also Senior Responsible Owner for HMIC's criminal justice programme plus its work on rape and is a HMIC Board member."

"The Chief Operating Officer is responsible for execution of the HMIC Board's strategy. This includes developing and implementing HMIC's operating model and running HMIC's inspection support services. He is also HMIC's Senior Responsible Owner for the evolution of the Police Report Card and is a HMIC Board member."
"The Programme Director - Police Governance Review is responsible for delivering HMIC's police authority inspection programme."
"The Head of Workforce is responsible for HMIC's value for money fieldwork, general police workforce advice and is a HMIC Board member."
"The Strategic Analysis Provider is responsible for providing analytical support to HMIC operations and is a HMIC Board member."
"The Programme Director - Police Integrity Review is responsible for delivering HMIC's police aspects of the police integrity programme."
